titleStmt.title: The royall receipt: or, Hezekiahs physicke A sermon deliuered at Pauls-Crosse, on Michaelmas Day, 1622. By Elias Petley.
titleStmt.author: Petley, Elias.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] for Edward Blackmore, and are to be sold at his shop, at the great south doore, going vp into S. Paules,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the great south doore, going vp into S. Paules
